SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!-----------Building command arguments------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PRV.INCLUDE.GATHER_TROUBLESHOOTING_INFO_LOGGING_PARAMS : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_SSH_PARAM ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** SHOW INTERFACES EXECUTED ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** SHOW INTERFACES ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE : IF &UC4RB_SONIC_TARGET_FILE# NE "" : RSET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT_FILE# = &UC4RB_SONIC_TARGET_FILE# : ELSE : SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : RSET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT_FILE# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"troubleshoot-log-&$RUNID#.log") : ENDIF
! Execute Command : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PRV.INCLUDE.GATHER_TROUBLESHOOTING_INFO_EXECUTE_COMMAND
: SET &ACTION_NAME# = "RunCommandAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_PREPARE_CMD@UNIX
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -command &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -outfile &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -flag 1")
: PRINT &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# ! Invoking java binar &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@UNIX :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : IF &STATUS# NE 0 : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT_FILE# = "" : ENDIF
